comment: Open Channel Management - Spillway adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.OpenChannelManagement/master/Spillway/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description for a generic Spillway made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain. Spillway represents a junction-type object, controlling the release of water from a dam or regulation structure downstream.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: apronElevation
contents.comment: The elevation at the bottom of the ogee spillway structure (P), just upstream of the spillway.

contents.name: apronLength
contents.comment: The total length of the spillway bottom

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: crestElevation
contents.comment: The crest elevation of the Spillway. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'

contents.name: crestLength
contents.comment: The length of the Spillway equals to the total length through which water passes. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: designDischarge
contents.comment: The design discharge (Qo) of the Spillway

contents.name: designDischargeCoefficient
contents.comment: The discharge coefficient (Co) for energy losses for the design discharge (Ho).

contents.name: designHead
contents.comment: The total upstream energy head for which the spillway is designed (Ho) for 'Ogee Spillway'

contents.name: dischargeCoefficient
contents.comment: The discharge coefficient for energy losses as water enters, flows and exits the spillway

contents.name: maxFloodElevation
contents.comment: The maximum elevation of water that can pass the spillway.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: numberAbutments
contents.comment: The number of abutments of an ogee spillway. Only for 'Ogee' type.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: spillwayWidth
contents.comment: The width of the spillway (m). Only for 'Broad-Crested' type

contents.name: tag
contents.comment: An optional text string used to qualify an item

contents.name: waterDischarge
contents.comment: The discharge over the spillway (Q)

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
